attributes.action: scrap the proposed tax on phones to fund fast internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public is tired of Labour's ever increasing range and level of taxes. If the PM wishes to provide better or faster internet access in limited internet access communities, he should give tax breaks or tax credits to private internet providers and telecom companies to provide services in these areas rather than penalising and raiding the taxpayer who has already been using their hard-earned salaries to pay for their own private internet services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
